personal.name: Steven Jenkins
personal.title: Full-Stack Engineer
personal.summary: Full-Stack Engineer specializing in revenue-critical systems and building performant, production-grade interfaces using Svelte 5 and SvelteKit.
personal.professionalSummary: Full-Stack Engineer specializing in revenue-critical systems and building performant, production-grade interfaces using Svelte 5 and SvelteKit. Architected and shipped complete web applications serving 800+ concurrent users with 99.9% uptime, optimizing front-ends to smoothly render 500+ real-time countdown timers with complex conditional queries against live data. Strong track record taking features from concept to production—designing in Figma, implementing responsive UIs with TypeScript, and deploying to production infrastructure. Technical expertise includes modern JavaScript/TypeScript development, performance optimization, component architecture, and building polished user experiences. Experience spans real-time data systems, financial applications with Stripe API integration, and scalable SaaS platforms generating revenue from day one.

experience.title: Founder & Technology Lead
experience.description: Lead technical architecture and engineering for client engagements across multiple industries
highlights: Manage complete product lifecycle from requirements through production deployment
Architect scalable web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks (Svelte 5, SvelteKit)
Make strategic technology decisions balancing scalability, cost, and time-to-market
Establish development processes and engineering best practices across client projects
Coordinate with stakeholders to align technical roadmaps with business objectives

experience.title: Founder & Technology Lead
experience.description: Led technical infrastructure development enabling client revenue scaling
highlights: Architected complete technology infrastructure supporting company scaling from founding to $6-9M annual revenue with 80+ employees

Designed and implemented subscription platform with Stripe API integration generating $250,000 in revenue, including payment reconciliation system calculating per-customer transfers based on invoice line items
Led enterprise migration of 80-100 user accounts across email platforms with zero data loss
Replaced legacy systems after previous engineering teams failed, delivering production-grade solutions
Managed complete technical operations including infrastructure planning, security, and stakeholder communication
Made strategic build vs. buy decisions for CRM, payment processing, and business automation systems
experience.concurrent: Position held concurrently with CaptiveOne role

experience.title: Head of Revenue Operations | Senior Solutions Engineer
experience.description: Built and managed 3-person engineering team using Scrum methodology, delivering 35+ production systems
highlights: Led cross-functional collaboration with sales and executive leadership on technical strategy and roadmap planning
Architected custom CRM platform with integrated financial modeling, workflow automation, and API integrations
Established technical standards for team deliverables, code quality, and system reliability
Managed stakeholder communication, translating business requirements into technical specifications
Developed pricing engines that became production billing infrastructure processing $500k+ invoices
Performed full lifecycle team management including recruiting, mentoring, training, and performance evaluation
Introduced agile software processes and best-in-class engineering practices to the team
Managed technical debt to maintain development velocity while minimizing production incidents

experience.title: Solutions Engineer | Sales Operations Coordinator
experience.description: Conducted technical discovery and requirements analysis with cross-functional stakeholders to architect solutions improving sales operations and pipeline efficiency
highlights: Designed and implemented custom CRM platform supporting complete sales lifecycle, defining data architecture, API integrations, automation workflows, and reporting capabilities
Defined data architecture, REST API integrations, and automation workflows for revenue operations
Built comprehensive financial modeling tools and sales enablement systems integrated into CRM, standardizing pipeline forecasting, revenue projections, and client deliverables
Partnered with CFO on technical solutions supporting financial analysis, mapping business processes with detailed cost breakdowns and identifying automation opportunities
Delivered technical training to business teams on advanced capabilities (Google Apps Script, financial automation), enabling self-service for complex data operations
Established development standards including pipeline management, testing procedures, deployment workflows, and cross-departmental handoff protocols

experience.title: Systems Administrator | Business Analyst
experience.description: Mapped and documented key business processes with time estimates and cost breakdowns per step
highlights: Coordinated with CFO to incorporate actual labor costs and identify efficiency opportunities
Implemented company-wide file storage policies and standardized workflows, collaborating with each department to design systems tailored to individual team needs
Drove adoption across the organization through training and change management
Bridged technical operations with business objectives through data-driven analysis
Managed network security, infrastructure planning, and technology operations
Coordinated system implementations based on cost-benefit analysis

achievements.title: Statistical Table Tennis
achievements.subtitle: Full-Stack SaaS Platform
achievements.overview: Architected and built complete production SaaS application from concept to paying customers in 3 months while managing multiple concurrent client engagements.
highlights: Sole developer: Full-stack ownership of authentication (Lucia Auth), database (Drizzle ORM + SQLite), RESTful APIs, UI/UX, and payment processing (Stripe)
Production infrastructure with 99.9% uptime on self-managed bare metal Ubuntu Server with redundant power, Nginx reverse proxy, PM2 process management
Performance engineering: Optimized front-end to smoothly render 500+ concurrent real-time countdown timers with complex conditional queries
Enterprise security: Device fingerprinting, multi-factor validation, session revocation, IP blocking, audit logging
Revenue infrastructure: Stripe subscription billing with automated payment reconciliation and customer portal
Product design: Created entire UX in Figma, translating designs to production components with customizable preferences

achievements.title: Wrench Totalcare Plus
achievements.subtitle: Complete System Architecture & iOS Application
achievements.overview: Full-stack ownership: Designed and implemented every layer including Firebase Authentication, Firestore database architecture, RESTful API endpoints, front-end UI/UX, and Stripe payment processing.
highlights: Revenue infrastructure: Embedded Stripe checkout invoicing with dynamic pricing based on transaction parameters, vehicle owners create connect accounts for automated fund transfers
Product design: Created entire UX in Figma, translating designs directly to production-ready components
Project Manager: Assigned work and reviewed pull requests for production codebase and live applications
External API endpoints with unique API keys and permissions per partner, utilizing SvelteKit
Isolated QA environment: Completely isolated testing infrastructure building alongside production for third-party developers
JWT-based token management for backward communication on completion of various customer steps

achievements.title: Macro Exotics
achievements.subtitle: Exotic Vehicle Rental Platform
achievements.overview: Full-stack ownership: Designed and implemented every layer including Firebase Authentication, Firestore database, RESTful API endpoints, front-end UI/UX with Svelte 5, and Stripe payment processing.
highlights: Revenue infrastructure: Implemented embedded Stripe checkout invoicing based on transaction parameters (price, duration, addons)
Vehicle owners prompted to create Stripe connect accounts which receive transfers after rental completion and disbursement calculations
Product design: Created entire UX in Figma, translating designs directly to production-ready components
Project Manager: Responsible for assigning work and reviewing pull requests for production codebase changes

achievements.title: Real-Time GPS Platform
achievements.subtitle: Scalable Event Infrastructure
achievements.overview: Architected real-time tracking platform utilizing GPS location and metadata, associating individual devices to information including team name, last update time, and dynamically calculated race position.
highlights: Technical achievement: 800+ concurrent users, 2,500+ livestream viewers, 99.9% uptime, $0.13 total infrastructure cost
System design: XML satellite feed processing, real-time database updates, dynamic ranking calculations, API endpoint design
Rebuilt complete system one week before production event when GPS provider changed API requirements
Maintained production system for 4 consecutive years with ongoing technical ownership
Event scaling: Platform supported event growth from $600k to $4.4M in fundraising

achievements.title: Payment Processing & Subscription Platform
achievements.subtitle: Financial Technology Infrastructure
achievements.overview: Architected subscription wellness platform generating $250,000 in revenue with Stripe API integration for subscription management, automated billing, and recurring payments.
highlights: Financial automation: Built payment reconciliation system calculating per-customer revenue transfers based on invoice line items
System components: RESTful API layer, admin dashboard, customer portal, automated benefit tracking
Third-party integration: HVMS practice management API for automated reimbursements
Led complete technical implementation from requirements through production deployment

achievements.title: Enterprise Technology Infrastructure
achievements.subtitle: Complete System Architecture
achievements.overview: Complete technical leadership for disaster consulting startup scaling to $6-9M revenue. Led all technology decisions from founding through 80+ employee scale.
highlights: Architected web infrastructure, automated systems, and enterprise integrations (Google Sheets API)
Executed enterprise migration of 80-100 accounts with zero downtime or data loss
Served as dedicated engineering leadership handling infrastructure, security, and strategic planning
Made build vs. buy decisions for employee management, job postings, and internal systems
Coordinated implementation across remote teams and multiple departments

infrastructureCloud: Firebase (Firestore, Functions, Auth, Hosting, Realtime Database)
